function.name: dbmreplace
function.description: Replaces the value for a key in a dbm database.

function.name: dbminsert
function.description: Inserts a value for a key in a dbm database.

function.name: dbmdelete
function.description: Deletes the value for a key from a dbm database.

function.name: dbmfirstkey
function.description: Retrieves the first key from a dbm database.

function.name: dbmnextkey
function.description: Retrieves the next key from a dbm database.

function.name: dbmfetch
function.description: Fetches a value for a key from a dbm database.

function.name: dbmexists
function.description: Tells if a value exists for a key in a dbm database.

function.name: dblist
function.description: Describes the dbm-compatible library being used.
